title: Vitamin K2 + D3 Supplement with BioPerine - Enhanced Absorption for Heart Health, Stronger Bones, and Immune Support
descriptionHtml:
Elevate your health with Success Chemistry’s Vitamin K2 + D3 Supplement, featuring BioPerine for enhanced nutrient absorption. Each capsule combines the powerful benefits of Vitamin K2 and Vitamin D3, supporting optimal calcium metabolism and promoting heart health, stronger bones, and a robust immune system.
Key Benefits:
  • Supports Heart Health: Helps regulate calcium levels in the arteries, promoting cardiovascular health and reducing the risk of arterial stiffness.
  • Strengthens Bones: Vitamin K2 and D3 work together to enhance bone density and strength by improving calcium utilization.
  • Boosts Immune Function: Supports immune health, helping your body defend against illnesses and maintain overall well-being.
  • Enhanced Absorption: BioPerine (black pepper extract) increases the bioavailability of the vitamins, ensuring your body absorbs the nutrients effectively.
  • High-Quality Ingredients: Each capsule is made with premium, natural ingredients, free from artificial additives and common allergens.
Why Choose Success Chemistry Vitamin K2 + D3? Our supplement is formulated for maximum effectiveness and absorption, ensuring you receive the full benefits. Each bottle contains 60 easy-to-swallow capsules, providing a convenient one-month supply. Invest in your health with Success Chemistry’s Vitamin K2 + D3 Supplement and experience improved bone health, cardiovascular support, and enhanced immunity.

Support your heart, bones, and immune system with the powerful combination of Vitamin K2 and D3, enhanced with BioPerine for superior absorption. Invest in your health today with Success Chemistry® Vitamin K2 + D3 Supplement.
shortDescriptionHtml: Boost your heart, bone, and immune health with Success Chemistry Vitamin K2 + D3 Supplement. Enhanced with BioPerine for superior absorption. Contains 125 mcg D3, 100 mcg K2, and 210 mg calcium per serving.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 1 Veggie Capsule
Servings Per Container: 60

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol) 5000 IU 1250%
Vitamin K2 (mk-7) 100 mcg 80%
Calcium (as Calcium Carbonate) 210 mg 15%
BioPerine® (Black Pepper Fruit Extract) 5 mg †

† Daily Value (DV) not established

Other Ingredients: Cellulose (vegetable capsule).
Distributed by: successchemistry.com
